attributes.action: End subsidies to Scotland and Wales.
attributes.additional_details:
To stop the subsidies (Barnett Formula) being paid to Scotland,Wales and Northern Ireland solely at the expense of the English Taxpayers. This subsidy costs every family in England 420.00 pounds/year.
It is totally unfair that these subsidies which is equivalent to £1624.00 pounds/head gives the devolved regions-

Free Prescriptions
Free Hospital Parking
Free Accomidation in Care Homes
Free University Tuition Fees ( even for Scottish Students studying at English Universities)

The time has come to stop these totally unfair payments so that we all play on the same pitch.
